account_id.description: This is generated by Canopy. A unique ID for the account.

account_status.description: The Status of the Account. Active upon account creation.

account_status_subtype.description: The subtype of the Status of the Account. Null upon account creation.

effective_at.description: The `Date-Time` that this account became/becomes active.

created_at.description: The `Date-Time` which the account was created in the API.

product.description: The product associated with the account

external_account_ids.description: An Array of External Account IDs. These should be used to connect accounts created in Canopy to Users in your system and any connected external systems.

total_balance.description: The total balance (in cents) associated with the account.

credit_limit_cents.description: Total Amount (in cents) that this account can borrow.

rate.description: The percentage interest applied to the account (i.e. 6.2 means 6.2%)

available_credit_balance.description: The total available credit balance (in cents) for the account.
